top.title: Inside Iran, panic as strikes hit but for some it's a moment of relief
top.summary: Iranians talk about what is happening inside the country, despite an almost total internet blackout.

top.title: Luxury Dubai hotel hit as Iran launches retaliatory strikes across region
top.summary: Smoke and flames rose from Dubai's Fairmont The Palm hotel as civilian targets came under fire along with the US military bases across the middle east.

top.title: At least 20 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
top.summary: Police fire tear gas to disperse crowds allegedly trying to take banknotes from the crash site.

top.title: Trump orders government to stop using Anthropic in battle over AI use
top.summary: The move announced on social media comes after a standoff between Anthropic's boss and the US Department of Defense.

top.title: Resident Evil Requiem's director on redefining the survival horror genre
top.summary: Director Koshi Nakanishi says balancing action and horror within the game has been a huge challenge.

top.title: 'I was on Instagram all day' - woman tells landmark trial
top.summary: The young woman, who accuses Meta and Google of making addictive social media platforms, has been speaking in court.
